title: Bob Forrest's True Hollywood Stories - Childhood Trauma, Addiction, Rock n' Roll, & Redemption
itunes:title: Bob Forrest's True Hollywood Stories - Childhood Trauma, Addiction, Rock n' Roll, & Redemption
description:
#199: On this episode we sit down with our friend and Hollywood legend Bob Forrest. Many of you will remember Bob Forrest from his days on Celebrity Rehab with Dr. Drew. Bob has lived a wild life as a rockstar, poet, & recovery advocate. On this episode we are diving deep with Bob to talk through childhood trauma, addiction, the life of a rockstar, and the path to redemption. 

To connect with Bob Forrest click HERE

To connect with Lauryn Evarts click HERE

To connect with Michael Bosstick click HERE
